// Step for a bit and then run the rest of the program.

-> _ = "breakpoint"
(godebug) n
-> x = mul(x, x)
(godebug) x
4
(godebug) print x
4
(godebug) step
-> var x int
(godebug) next
-> for i := 0; i < m; i++ {
(godebug) x
0
(godebug) print m
4
(godebug) next
-> x = add(x, m)
(godebug) continue
What's going on? x == 16
